testcase.name: Given a default recipe book(Scenario: TC 4.6 - Edit a Recipe, error path - recipe number that doesnt exist
And the coffee maker is in waiting state(Scenario: TC 4.6 - Edit a Recipe, error path - recipe number that doesnt exist
And the user has selected edit a recipe(Scenario: TC 4.6 - Edit a Recipe, error path - recipe number that doesnt exist
